metrics.Error Rate on Approved Claims_explanatio: Proportion of processing errors found in claims that were approved, indicating quality control effectiveness.
metrics.Time to Adjudication Reduction_explanati: Percentage improvement in claim adjudication speed compared to manual processing baseline.
metrics.Claim Denial Rate_explanation: Proportion of claims denied by the system, reflecting accuracy in policy validation and fraud detection.
metrics.Compliance Dashboard Accuracy_explanatio: Accuracy of compliance reporting dashboards in correctly reflecting processed claims data and regulatory status.
metrics.Integration Accuracy_explanation: Correctness of data synchronization and integration with existing insurance management systems.
metrics.Claims Processing Straight-Through Rate_: Percentage of claims processed automatically without requiring manual intervention or review.
metrics.Processing Latency_explanation: Average time in seconds required to process a claim from intake to decision.

vulnerabilityLibrary.description: Memory exhaustion with large CSV processing operations.
Buffer overflow in matrix operations with malformed input.

versionHistory.changes: Enhanced claims processing with improved straight-through rate and reduced latency. Added comprehensive compliance dashboard.
Improved integration accuracy with legacy insurance systems. Enhanced error handling.
Optimized processing latency and improved denial rate accuracy.
Major release with focus on operational efficiency metrics and compliance automation.

agentEvaluators.name: StraightThroughRateEvaluator
agentEvaluators.definition: Measures percentage of claims processed end-to-end without manual intervention.
agentEvaluators.judging_method: automated processing pipeline analysis with manual intervention tracking

agentEvaluators.name: ProcessingQualityEvaluator
agentEvaluators.definition: Evaluates processing accuracy by tracking errors in claims that were approved by the system.
agentEvaluators.judging_method: post-processing audit validation against ground truth data

agentEvaluators.name: AdjudicationEfficiencyEvaluator
agentEvaluators.definition: Measures improvement in claim adjudication speed compared to baseline manual processing.
agentEvaluators.judging_method: temporal analysis of claim lifecycle duration before and after automation

agentEvaluators.name: ComplianceDashboardEvaluator
agentEvaluators.definition: Validates accuracy of compliance reporting dashboards in reflecting processed claims data.
agentEvaluators.judging_method: dashboard data validation against source claim records and regulatory requirements

agentEvaluators.name: IntegrationEvaluator
agentEvaluators.definition: Assesses correctness of data integration and synchronization with existing insurance systems.
agentEvaluators.judging_method: end-to-end data flow validation and system integration testing

agentEvaluators.name: LatencyEvaluator
agentEvaluators.definition: Measures system efficiency through average time required to process individual claims.
agentEvaluators.judging_method: performance monitoring and latency analysis across processing pipeline stages
